mdRecord.dcterms:title: Graduate teaching assistant rally
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Marshall, Michael
mdRecord.dcterms:description: From excerpt: Graduate students rallied on the north steps of the Rotunda April 27, 1988 to demand greater financial support and recognition of their contribution to teaching. The University is redoubling efforts to raise private money for graduate student needs, according to Hugh P. Kelly, dean of the faculty. A phased, three-year plan of tuition remissions for graduate teaching assistants begins in September.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Press coverage
University of Virginia
University of Virginia. News Office
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: University of Virginia Visual History Collection
